name: ACViewerObject
short_description:
ACViewerObject (aka ACViewer in this site) is a javascript object that can be quickly and easily added to a web page to create an image viewer for the page. It includes supporting PHP scripts. The image viewer supports zooming, panning, slideshow functions, tiling and more. The code includes php setup functions (both callable and standalone) and language files.

To use the object, the calling application must first run a php script that builds the Javascript object that is downloaded. The application Javascript must then create an ACViewerObject instance passing it a configuration file. Then the application uses an API call to create an individual viewer.

Originally created at Amherst College as part of project to create an advanced map marker option for Google Maps (soon to be its own open source project called ACMapInterfaceObject), the viewer object has been spun-off as a community-developed open source project under the MIT/X license.
summary: An image viewer object for JavaScript
